title: LF Top & JG & Mid for Team Plat Plus Pref
body:
Hey, guys, I play on Terra Knight Gaming as their support and I am looking for a Top & JG & Mid player Pref Plat plus and someone who likes watching and playing competitive style gameplay.

Looking for people who play almost daily and have the luxury of competing in several tournaments Summoner Society Ladder & Cyber Gamer Ladder on the weekly.

Would like it if you had:
A healthy ability to use voice comms in game
A vast champion pool and can adapt to meta shifts.

Add me on client: 
IGN:  Wolves 
Or add manager on TKG Hal
